svt_toggle_cov_bit_vector Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_toggle_cov_bit_vector:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Class used to support toggle coverage for multi-bit buses. Provides this support by bundling together multiple individual svt_toggle_cov_bit instances.


Public Member Functions

function void  bit_cov ( bit bit_val , int ix = 0 )
function void  new ( string name , int unsigned actual_size = SIZE )

Member Function Documentation

  function void
 svt_toggle_cov_bit_vector::bit_cov
 (  bit bit_val , int ix = 0  ) 

Provide a new bit_val to be recognized and sampled.

bit_val - The new value associated with the bit.

ix - The index of the bit to be covered.

  function void
 svt_toggle_cov_bit_vector::new
 (  string name , int unsigned actual_size = SIZE  ) 

CONSTRUCTOR: Creates a new instance of the svt_toggle_cov_bit_vector class.

name - The name for the cover bit vector, used as the prefix for the cov_bit covergroups.

actual_size - The actual number of bits that are to be covered.
